channel.title: How do I install the new core-api version of Radix?
channel.description:
The Radix Core-Api branch of code in the RadixDLT repository is the latest version of the Radix Node software that is under active development. It implements the new low level Core-Api that will replace the existing Archive node API and is required by the new Radix Network Gateway reference implementation.
The installation steps are documented here: https://docs.radixpool.com/bleeding-edge/running-a-radix-core-api-node
